EmailTemplate.name: File Sent for Review
EmailTemplate.subject: WRFTask {!WRF_Task__c.Name} File Review Progress
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello,
{!WRF_Task__c.Name} was sent for approval 24 hours ago. If you have not already done so please close your task and notify the files intended recipient. If the file is returned for additional work, please have a “revisit” subtask opened to track file completion.
Click here to view the WRF Task: {!WRF_Task__c.Link}
Thank You!
